text: Deportivo Toluca Fútbol Club S.A. de C.V. is a Mexican football club. ==Honours== *Mexican Primera División: (10) 1966-67, 1967–68, 1974–75, Verano 1998, Verano 1999, Verano 2000, Apertura 2002, Apertura 2005, Apertura 2008, Bicentenario 2010 **Runner Up: (6) 1956-57, 1957–58, 1970–71, Invierno 2000, Apertura 2006, Apertura 2012 *Segunda División de México: (1) 1952-53 *Copa México: (2) 1955-56, 1988–89 *Campeón de Campeones: (4) 1966-67, 1967–68, 2002–03, 2005–06 ===International=== *CONCACAF Champions League: (2) 1968, 2003 ===National friendly=== * Copa Orgullosamente Marty: 1998 * Copa Chihuahua-El Heraldo: 2008 ===International friendly=== * III Torneo Pentagonal Internacional de la Ciudad de México: 1960 * Singapore International Foursquare: 1999 * Trofeo Hispanomexicano: 2003 * México-Yemen: 2008 Sub-15 Toluca Category:1917 establishments in North America Category:1910s establishments in Mexico Category:Toluca
title: Deportivo Toluca F.C.
